Miller highlighted the surprising scale of India's oil imports from Russia, nearly matching China's. This rebuke follows the imposition of tariffs on Indian goods and warnings of further penalties if oil purchases continue without a peace agreement.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-financing-russias-war-says-trump-aide/articleshow/123083006.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-financing-russias-war-says-trump-aide/articleshow/123083006.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 04:46:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="6860" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123083023,imgsize-6860.cms"/></item><item><title>'Mistreated, missed my flight': Army officer files FIR against SpiceJet</title><description><![CDATA[An Army officer is under investigation after allegedly assaulting SpiceJet employees at Srinagar airport for enforcing baggage rules. This led to a fatal argument. Police recovered a knife and T-shirt from the crime scene in DLF Phase 3.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/27-year-old-delhi-woman-held-for-killing-live-in-partner-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123067518.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/27-year-old-delhi-woman-held-for-killing-live-in-partner-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123067518.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 07:36:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NIKHIL SHARMA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2354544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123084583,imgsize-2354544.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: R Ashwin slams Gill and Gambhir - 'In today's day and age...' </title><description><![CDATA[R Ashwin has criticized Shubman Gill's captaincy and Gautam Gambhir's coaching during the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series, citing a "lack of game awareness."       <title><![CDATA[RBI revises AIF investment norms for banks and NBFCs: Stricter caps from Jan 2026]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/finance/rbi-new-rules-aif-investment-banks-and-nbfcs-stricter-caps-from-jan-2026-19645388.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Under the new directions, no single RE can invest more than 10% of an AIF scheme’s total corpus. All regulated entities together cannot contribute more than 20% to one AIF scheme.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:23:16 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2023/12/startup-funding.jpg"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

    </item>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[India-UK FTA to boost manufacturing opportunities, spur trade to $120 billion: Sunil Bharti Mittal]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-uk-fta-manufacturing-trade-boost-sunil-bharti-mittal-exclusive-19643167.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The India-UK Free Trade Agreement will open up new manufacturing opportunities for British firms in India and is expected to more than double bilateral trade to $120 billion over the next five years, said Sunil Bharti Mittal, Chairman of Bharti Enterprises. He highlighted the advantages of lower tariffs, smoother mobility, and deeper cooperation in sectors like defence, technology, and education as key outcomes of the deal.]]></description>
